title: Psychiat-List Now Up
summary:
Key ideas
- The author has received requests from people in the rationalist community to recommend a psychiatrist or therapist.
- He cannot recommend his own group due to conflict of interest.
- The author has created a list (inspired by Anisha M) of mental health professionals recommended by members of the rationalist community.
- The list is currently limited to the Bay Area but the author hopes to expand it with crowd-sourced recommendations.

Key learnings
- It is important to acknowledge and address conflict of interest in professional recommendations.
- Crowd-sourcing recommendations can be an effective way to expand knowledge and resources.

Key questions
- How can people in areas outside of the Bay Area access the list and make recommendations?
- How can the author ensure that the professionals on the list are verified and qualified?
- How else can the rationalist community support each other's mental health and wellness?
